short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Say no to mindless agreements. Get instant, concise summaries of “Terms and Conditions” on the web. Know, before you agree!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When was the last time you read "Terms and Conditions" on the web before clicking "☑️ I agree?"

We get it—legal documents are often too long and difficult to read, so we shrug and mindlessly agree to them without actually understanding what we're signing up for.

Barrister Gemini changes that. It transforms lengthy terms and conditions into clear, concise summaries, so you are informed before you agree.

Key features:

1) Automatically detects when you're on a "Terms and Conditions" or "User Agreement" page and pops up an icon at the bottom right.

2) Click the icon to get a quick summary of the key things you should know before agreeing.

You may get a surprise or two about what’s hidden in the fine print you’ve been ignoring!

We value your feedback! Please share your thoughts, as we're continuously improving Barrister Gemini. Currently, we're working on integrating machine learning to make the detection even smarter and more accurate.
